author: asd12508

text:
Imagine, you are surrunded by almost 20 ennemies, you are on your own, you can't run. You have to fight, you know you won't survive it.
Then, you hear this song. You don't know where it came from, no one knows.
At 0.20, you start shooting everything you see. At 0.41, 9 ennemies are down. You jumped out of your positions and you shoot two other guys.
Only 9 left. You prepare a grenade, you throw it, now, there is only 5 ennemies left. One run away, so there is only 4 guys to kill.
You take your pistol, you jump out of your cover and you shoot. One guy down, an other injured. You see a grenade on a body, you take it you throw it.
That's it, you won. Because of this song !!!
